text: @TuckerCarlson Tucker, on March 12th or 13th you had the governor of Ohio on.  He claimed Ohio already had 100,000 cases of COVID-19 & that # was going to double every 6 days.  At that rate Ohio should have 400,000 cases, but as of tonight they have 1,400.  Will you address this on your show?

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
